test.name: Adverbs with TO Be
test.question: Where will the adverb go if the sentence is affirmative or negative?

answers.a1: Before the to be verb I always am happy
answers.a2: Behind the to be verb I am always happy
answers.a3: At the end of the phrase I am happy always

solution.solution: The adverbs with to be verb always go after the verb.

test.name: Adverbs with TO Be 2

answers.a1: Before the to be verb I always am happy 2
answers.a2: Behind the to be verb I am always happy 2
answers.a3: At the end of the phrase I am happy always 2

solution.solution: The adverbs with to be verb always go after the verb. 2
